intro: Anamomis ferruginea, commonly known as the rusty anamomis, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that range in color from white to pink. Its leaves are typically elliptical and have a slightly rough texture. Anamomis ferruginea is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories.
